description: A detailed look into the demographic, economic and housing characteristics of North Dorchester using data gathered from the American Community Survey 2005-2009.

metadata.description: The American Community Survey (ACS) is an annual survey conducted by the US Census Bureau using a sample of the total population to create estimates. The Research Division created a series of profiles based on neighborhood and planning district boundaries. This profile contains demographic characteristics such as race and ethnicity, languages spoken at home, and educational attainment; economic characteristics such as occupation, per capital income, and poverty status; and housing characteristics such as occupancy status, gross rent, and housing tenure.

name: North Dorchester, Planning District: American Community Survey 2007-2011
